item.title: seerc 2014 Circle of digits (二分+后缀数组)

item.title: seerc 2014 D - Frame (傻逼题)
item.description: 题目链接 思路：注意xy-(x-2)*(y-2)=2x+2y-4，一定被2整除。因此siz为2的也是合法的。这个比较容易忘掉。 其他的判定条件都

item.title: seerc 2014 A Banks (暴力)
item.description: 题目链接 题意：n个数围成一圈，对于负数可以进行magic操作，也就是取反，但是会影响到左右相邻的，加上这个负数。问最少进行多少次magic操

item.title: hdu 5763 || 2016 multi #4 1001 Another Meaning (kmp+dp)

item.title: hdu 5119 - Happy Matt Friends（dp解法）
item.description: Description Matt has N friends. They are playing a game together. Each of Matt’s friends has a magic number. In the game, Matt selects some (could be zero) of his friends. If the xor (exclusive-or) sum of the selected friends’magic numbers is no less than M , Matt wins. Matt wants to know

item.title: hdu 5113 Black And White
item.description: 题意是说用k重颜色填充n*m的方格，第i种颜色要用ci次，保证ci（i属于1..k）的和为n”m，问是否有可行解，若有，输出任意
